observation:
You have successfully navigated to the ingredients section for "The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies." Here is the list of ingredients needed:

- 2 cups white sugar
- 1 ½ cups butter, softened
- 4 large eggs
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 5 cups all-purpose flour
- 2 teaspoons baking powder
- 1 teaspoon salt

You can now begin preparing the cookies using these ingredients.
